steps.name: Enter Your Text
steps.description: Start by typing your message into the designated input box. Ensure each character is correctly placed, as the translator will convert them into Morse code. Double-check for typos to guarantee accurate translation results.

steps.name: Select Translation Mode
steps.description: To choose the translation mode, locate the mode selector at the top of the interface. Click the dropdown menu, then select either 'Text to Morse' or 'Morse to Text' based on your requirement. Confirm your choice to proceed.

steps.name: View and Copy Output
steps.description: After translating your text to Morse code, locate the output box below the input field. Highlight the Morse code by clicking and dragging your cursor over it. Right-click and select 'Copy' to easily save the translation for later use.
